name: Lawful Good
definition: Upholds cosmic laws to foster benevolence and justice.

name: Neutral Good
definition: Acts with compassion, unbound by strict rules or chaos.

name: Chaotic Good
definition: Breaks unjust structures to liberate the innocent.

name: Lawful Neutral
definition: Enforces balance and order above mercy or malice.

name: True Neutral
definition: Maintains equilibrium, interfering only when essential.

name: Chaotic Neutral
definition: Embraces change and unpredictability as the highest law.

name: Lawful Evil
definition: Bends rules and systems to serve a strict personal agenda.

name: Neutral Evil
definition: Pursues self-interest pragmatically, indifferent to order or chaos.

name: Chaotic Evil
definition: Sows anarchy and destruction purely for the thrill of upheaval.
